00026 String2::String2()
00027 {
00028   s = new char[2];
00029   s[0]='0';
00030   s[1]='\0';
00031 }
00032 
00033 String2::String2(const char *ss)
00034 {
00035   s = new char[strlen(ss)+1];
00036   strcpy(s,ss);
00037   convertit_en_majuscule(s);
00038 }
00039 
00040 String2::~String2()
00041 {
00042   delete[] s;
00043 }
00044 
00045 String2::String2(const String2& ss)
00046 {
00047   s = new char[strlen(ss.s)+1];
00048   strcpy(s,ss.s);
00049 }
00050 
00051 String2::String2(String2* ss)
00052 {
00053   s = new char[strlen(ss->s)+1];
00054   strcpy(s,ss->s);
00055 }

00058 String2* String2::substring(int i0, int i1)
00059 {
00060   char* ss = new char[i1-i0+1];
00061   for (int i=i0; i<i1; i++)
00062     ss[i]=s[i];
00063 
00064   String2* str=new String2(ss);
00065   delete[] ss;
00066   return str;
00067 }
